channel.title: 614 client connecting to source
channel.description: I downloaded a source and a client from someone else who reccomeneded it. How do i put those two toghter so they run on my source.. It might be a nooby question but i never found out O_O.

item.title: 614 client connecting to source
item.dc:creator: @Nathan_R Nathan R
item.description:
@Nathan_R wrote:

i dont even get his question

Read full topic

item.title: 614 client connecting to source
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

Open your source folder.
Click run.bat
that will start the server.

Open your client folder.
Search in Launch.java I believe it is. Search for 127.0.0.1, or 0.0.0.0
If neither of those show up search for the IP String and change the IP in the client to either of those.

Compile the client and run it. It will auto connect to your default IP (127.0.0.1)

Read full topic
